q: "In addition to creating the jobs of the future, clean energy benefits the U.S. economy by ultimately making energy costs more affordable for consumers, especially if their dollars stay in America," Sergio Marchionne said. Hydraulic hybrid vehicle technology is one more promising path worth pursuing in the effort to reduce our carbon footprint, and we are excited to partner with the EPA to push forward on this track. confirmed that it would be proper for the attorney general to obtain the views of ministers on the national interest before reaching his own independent decision. Ministers' views would be passed to the DPP and he would then exercise independent judgment, taking on board the serious considerations that have been given to the matter by other ministers and the attorney general . All this strikes me as perfectly proper. Before authorising the arrest and detention of a visiting politician such as Henry Kissinger or Donald Rumsfeld , the DPP would take into account any views expressed by William Hague or Liam Fox

Guantanamo one of worlds finest prison: Donald Rumsfeld WASHINGTON( AFP)- The "war on terror" prison at the US naval base in Guantanamo Bay, Cuba is one of the finest prison systems in the world, former defense secretary Donald Rumsfeld said in an interview with Fox News on Tuesday. Donald Rumsfeld , who is promoting his autobiography titled "Known and Unknown," praised US military personnel that worked at the site in

Former Defense Donald Rumsfeld Donald Rumsfeld , in an interview with the Fox News, faulted the Bush administration for failing to effectively make the case for Guantanamo Bay, saying the facility was and still is one of the finest prison systems in the world. The former Pentagon chief also defended the Bush administration's handling of the Iraq war, saying none of the top officials lied about weapons of mass destruction as a pretext for war, and he
